HOW'BOUT THEM COWBOYS?!

This was my first upload to the piratebay. When I download stuff it's almost always compressed in rar files, i didn't thing it was so complicated. But from now on i'll try to upload the video uncompressed, it's not a problem.
Anyways, you cannot compress videos too much.

Let me say thanks again dani00cl for your first torrent. Well done! I didn't think I'd seen your name before, and obviously any NFL games are really appreciated here, especially at the moment when other regular uploaders are having problems.

All I was trying to say was that some people not used to extracting RARs might think the process of finding, installing and utilising a suitable program for the job (7-Zip seems to be a good free one) rather a lot of hassle.

Anyway, thanks again and I look forward to your upcoming games.
